TopicTitle: How to show other spacecrafts in camera view while in rendevouz

Articles.Content:
I am 1500m away from my target, and no matter what I do I cannot see it in camera mode.

I have seen countless videos of people doing orbital rendevouzes and they cann see a marker in camera mode with the distance on it.

How do you activate this marker?

I have already tag the other craft as my target, both of them are in the same orbit, just a few meters away but it feels like Im trying to dock to nothing!

Many many thanks for your help
Those markers can be turned on and off with the F4 key. Try hitting that.
